description:
Harley, Addison, Devin, and Berke had an incredible time on our ski retreat.

After a little bit of macho posturing, the guys really bonded and since we got back they've actually been hanging out together on their own!

For our last day in the ski house, we decided to do one big fuckfest. I think Devin was the most excited and it's a good thing too. Not only was he on the caboose end of a fuck train, he also had two huge cocks in his ass at once!
title: Ski Retreat Fuckfest
